statements: SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location = 'Garden'
SELECT id, date FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 50
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE date = '2022-07-15'
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location = 'Backyard' AND moisture_level < 30
SELECT id, location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData ORDER BY moisture_level DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM SoilMoistureData GROUP BY location HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture_level, MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE date > '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE growth_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY last_watered ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate, last_watered FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE last_watered IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data JOIN Plant_Growth_Data ON Soil_Moisture_Data.sensor_id = Plant_Growth_Data.plant_id WHERE growth_rate > 0.3;
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE last_watered IS NULL;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture FROM Soil_Moisture_Data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 50
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE health_status = 'good'
SELECT * FROM Irrigation_Systems WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY water_flow_rate DESC
SELECT system_id, status, timestamp FROM Irrigation_Systems
SELECT id, moisture_level, sensor_id FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate, health_status FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE health_status = 'good' ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT system_id, status, water_flow_rate FROM Irrigation_Systems WHERE status = 'active' AND water_flow_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE health_status = 'poor' OR growth_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT soil_type, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY moisture_level ASC;
SELECT plant_id, growth_stage, growth_rate FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY plant_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT system_type, efficiency FROM Irrigation_Systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, plant_id, correlation_coefficient FROM Correlation_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY correlation_coefficient DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT plant_id, growth_stage, growth_rate FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE growth_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY growth_rate ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_type, efficiency FROM Irrigation_Systems WHERE last_maintenance < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY system_id;
SELECT sensor_id, plant_id, correlation_coefficient FROM Correlation_Data WHERE correlation_coefficient >= 0.7 ORDER BY sensor_id, plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND timestamp > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT system_type, flow_rate, status FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_type = 'Drip';
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_logs FROM irrigation_log GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY moisture_level ASC;
SELECT plant_id, growth_rate, growth_date FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY growth_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_type, flow_rate, status FROM irrigation_system WHERE status='active';
SELECT plant_id, system_id, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' ORDER BY plant_id, start_time;
